title: Number of Papa John 's restaurants worldwide 2007 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of restaurants. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Number of restaurants has increased over the Year.
Number of restaurants is roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Number of restaurants, of value 5303.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of restaurants about 3208.0 was reached at Year 2007
